import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../CSS/Profil.css"; import TweetList from "../JS/TweetList"; function Profil({email, firstName, lastName, _id}) { const [mode, setMode] = useState('profilTweets'); return

{firstName}

{lastName}

setMode('profilTweets')}>
Tweets
setMode('profilLikes')}>
J'aime
; } export default Profil;
